version_description:
• Fixed bug causing 1080p video resolution to be unavailable for some PS4 Pro users
• Prevent screen dimming while remote play is active

• Fixed bug causing 1080p video resolution to be unavailable for some PS4 Pro users
• Prevent screen dimming while remote play is active
• Miscellaneous bug fixes
• Miscellaneous bug fixes
• Added support for internet play via IPv6-only mobile connections

• Added support for the iPhone X
• Miscellaneous bug fixes

• Added support for the iPhone X
• Miscellaneous bug fixes

• R-Play is now available as a yearly subscription with 14-day free trial (this does not affect existing paid users, who will continue to receive all future updates without requiring a subscription)
• Various improvements to the technical support syste

• Fixed regression on settings screen

• Reverted R-Play back to being a one-off paid app (as opposed to free download + subscription)
• Streaming no longer terminates when opening Control Center
• Miscellaneous other bug fixes and stability enhancements
